attributes.action: Veto FYROM's entrance to NATO and the EU
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Follow Mr SARCOZI'S example and recognise that the Titovian history revisionists of FYROM (Former Yukoslav Republic of Macedonia) are trying to hijack Greek history with dubius motives and recognise MACEDONIA as a greek province and all Macedonians as Greeks!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
